snippet: Hulu will promote its original programming to advertisers this week in an annual ritual known as upfronts that is typically reserved for cable channels and network broadcasters.
abstract: Hulu shifts gears and plans to promote its original programming to advertisers in an annual ritual known as upfronts that is typically reserved for cable channels and network broadcasters; their online television service tops two million subscribers for its $8-a-month Hulu Plus service in the first quarter, up 500,000 from fourth-quarter 2011.

byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and BRIAN STELTER

lead_paragraph: Hulu will promote its original programming to advertisers this week in an annual ritual known as upfronts that is typically reserved for cable channels and network broadcasters.

headline.seo: Hulu, the Online TV Site, Adds Original Programming
headline.main: An Online TV Site Grows Up
headline.print_headline: An Online TV Site Grows Up
